casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. KING
v.
WELLS 2018-0865 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 7, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Prohibition. On omnibus motion for immediate removal, for an order to refer, and for the appointment of a three-member review panel under Gov.Jud.R. II, Section 4. Motion denied.
